alert.note: Alert for Day; Marshall (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:31PM MDT until July 13 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Day County in northeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Marshall County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 330 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cattail Lake, or 16 miles east of Langford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Eden around 340 PM CDT. Piyas Lake around 350 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Buffalo Lakes. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
